name: The Bellows (itch)
description:
The Bellows is a story based vr horror experience that will be releasing in October.

The purpose of this (roughly) 5-10 minute long trailer/demo is to get feedback on game dynamics with snippets of content that represent events in the full story.

We appreciate and encourage your feedback! Any input is highly valued as we want to make the best experience possible, and your critiques will only help us further that goal... our email is business@castlestepsgames.com if you have any extra inquiries or thoughts you'd like to share, and please like our Facebook if you would like to stay updated about the full release... Enjoy!

The demo is now on Steam! Check out our new page on Steam with some more information about the final release: http://store.steampowered.com/app/529670/

*We have just uploaded an updated version of the demo featuring a few bug fixes as well as two new locomotion options!
